title: AI, Global Innovation, and Founder Foresight Take Center Stage at NYU’s China–US Entrepreneurship Competition
description: Organized by New York University, the Second China–US Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition concluded successfully on November 22 at Vanderbilt Hall of the NYU School of Law. The event brought together founders and investment institutions from both China and the United States, attracting an audience of over 300 attendees. The competition aims to deepen bilateral exchange [...]The post AI, Global Innovation, and Founder Foresight Take Center Stage at NYU’s China–US Entrepreneurship Competition appeared first on TechBullion.

title: He created Grand Theft Auto. Now he's back with a novel about an AI that hijacks your mind
description: A Better Paradise is a dystopian vision of the near future in which an AI-led computer game goes rogue.
